Celeron welds the casing on to his new sound device.  He figured since radio signals can't get in or out of the shields,  the computer must be using a loudspeaker which requires that sound waves travel through the shields.

Flying down he notices the familiar guns peak out of the ship.
"Lower defensive shielding."
"Please state authorization code."
"Celeron, 1200 omega omega pi cappa"
"Incorrect authorization code."
Celeron points his small tubular device at the shield generator perched on the top of the ship.  He pushes the button.  The box rips from the ship and its power source falling to the rocks below the ship and breaking open.
"Damage!  Damage!"
"Emergency alert will activate in 10....."
Celeron rushes toward the lower ramp-door; the cannons barely miss him as he rolls into the interior of the ship.
"6......"
Celeron rushes to the bridge following the doors that he had broken open earlier.  Upon entering the bridge he notices the same floating head being projected...He steps into a side room which he hopes will contain the ship's servers.  Sucess.
"2........1......0.....Initiating energon shooooockk."
Cutting power the appropriate defensive computers he is able to avert the shock.  He is now in command of this impressive wreck.
